PHRASE.LANG: Developed and manufactured by the D2O Special Weapons Division. The D2O-RGLX8 is an eight-shot rotary grenade launcher system. The D2O-RGLX8 is built around a large revolver cylinder. Each chamber in the D2O-RGLX8's cylinder is actually a D2O-25 grenade launcher barrel. As the weapon is fired, the chambers rotate and advance the next barrel to the firing position. When the action locks for firing, the cylinder slides forward to seal the individual chamber against the weapon’s main barrel. This weapon can only be fitted for male personnel.[#Legal]

Développé et fabriqué par la division des Armes spéciales de la D2O. Le D2O-RGLX8 est un lance-grenades rotatif à huit tirs. Le D2O-RGLX8 a été construit sur la base d'un large cylindre de revolver. Son cylindre est composé de huit canons de lance-grenades D2O-25. Lorsque vous tirez, les chambres pivotent et le canon suivant se met en position de tir. Lorsque le mécanisme se verrouille pour tirer, le cylindre glisse vers l'avant pour sceller la chambre individuelle contre le canon principal de l'arme. Cette arme ne convient qu'aux agents hommes.[#Legal]

Developed and manufactured by the D2O Special Weapons Division. The D2O-RGLX8 is an eight-shot rotary grenade launcher system. The D2O-RGLX8 is built around a large revolver cylinder. Each chamber in the D2O-RGLX8's cylinder is actually a D2O-25 grenade launcher barrel. As the weapon is fired, the chambers rotate and advance the next barrel to the firing position. When the action locks for firing, the cylinder slides forward to seal the individual chamber against the weapon’s main barrel. This weapon can only be fitted for male personnel.[#Legal]
